message: A fair start, let's take it from here!
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to go.
You didn't take my first offer, so I'll take a bigger slice this time
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's both take a bigger share this time.
You're not getting the better end of the deal, Bob. I'll take another big slice this time
Alice, I'm willing to take a bigger share this time to end this game, but it's not fair if I take everything. Let's be reasonable and come to a compromise.
